snippet: Jennifer Grout, an American singer who has surprised many with her renditions of Arab songs, was a finalist on the television show “Arabs Got Talent.”
abstract: Jennifer Grout, an American singer who has surprised many with her renditions of Arab songs, was a finalist on the television show “Arabs Got Talent.”

headline.main: American Singer Is a Finalist, but Not a Winner on ‘Arabs Got Talent'
headline.print_headline: American Singer Loses On ‘Arabs Got Talent’
